The interior could be decorated with various types of teapots in different styles, sizes, and colors. Dishes could be served in teapots, offering an artistic presentation that adds a fun element to the dining experience. Confidence Score: 0.9

They can manipulate teapots to pour tea, infuse flavors, and create unique blends, all while exploring a fantastical world filled with teapot-themed creatures and landscapes. Confidence Score: 0.85

These could have features like automatic lid opening when you press your lips against it, or smart technology that adjusts the temperature based on the type of tea being brewed.
